text: Trump plans to close Kennedy Center for about two years, starting in July - The Washington Post

text: 'TODAY' Anchor Savannah Guthrie’s Mom Missing - TMZ

text: ‘Historic storm’ delivers biggest snowfall in decades for North Carolina - The Washington Post

text: Tens of thousands back Czech president amid cabinet dispute - dw.com
